RMIInterface

Interface RMIClientHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMICommunication

    public interface RMIClientHandler
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This class acts as a bridge between the server's methods and the client via RMI. Created by Emanuele on 09/05/2016.
